existing_features.title: Add a user-visible "Back" button on the Local Updates page that navigates the user to the Home page when clicked.
Wire Local Updates page navigation to the app-level view router so the Local Updates "Back" button can switch the current view to "home".

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a Back button on the Local Updates page that navigates to the home page

projectName: Make Local Updates Back button navigate to Home page
